Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard, Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements IBoard, Serializable
Implementation of the game board for Battleship. Manages a grid of cells, ship placements, and game state tracking. Implements Serializable to support game state persistence.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs a board with the default size (10x10). Initializes an empty grid with no ships.

    • Board

      public Board(int size)
      Constructs a board with a custom size. Initializes an empty grid with the specified dimensions.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the board (width and height)

    • placeShip

      public boolean placeShip(IShip ship)
      Places a ship on the board. Validates that all ship coordinates are within bounds and not occupied.
      Specified by:
      placeShip in interface IBoard
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the ship was placed successfully, false otherwise

    • removeShip

      public boolean removeShip(IShip ship)
      Removes a ship from the board. Clears all cells occupied by the ship and removes it from the ships list.
      Specified by:
      removeShip in interface IBoard
      Parameters:
      ship - the ship to remove
      Returns:
      true if the ship was removed successfully, false if ship not found
